@mrpink6 

The timecode at the top of the screen is part of the movie. :)
The Blu-ray rip, available on other torrent sites, most certainly does not have a burned-in timecode.

@spartan: you are absolutely right. the producer put it in as an artistic touch. 

@all: the timecode is part of the movie, another artistic touch. this isnt really a movie, more of an artistic venture.
